description: Enjoy music anytime/anywhere with XtremeMac’s Soma Travel. Just dock and play your iPod, iPhone or iPad for surprisingly big stereo sound in a small portable speaker dock. AC adapter or batteries are not required, the speaker is powered by the docked device. The ultra compact design is lightweight and perfect for on-the-go, its push in/pull out dock connector is protected during transport. Soma Travel allows you to charge and sync your Apple device while docked with the pass-through USB connection. Features also include swing out legs for stability and a case-friendly dock to accommodate most devices while still in its protective case.
title: Xtrememac IPU-STR-11 Portable Stereo Speaker with Dock for iPod, iPhone and iPad
